name: Ori Lahav
title: GM Israel
bio: Lot's of Bio but right now. Co-founder of Outbrain (Teads) and Reversim podcast. Teads GM Israel

name: Ran Tavory
title: Research @ TII
bio: The voice @ reversim, ML, data, software

name: Eloise Ann Friedman
title: Director of PlatformX
bio:
Started as a backend developer, became a group manager and Director, before deciding to move over to the DevOps and infrastructure side, where it is much easier to make an impact at scale.
Family, fun, running and ice cream complete the story

name: Shai Yallin
title: Software Gardener
bio: Shai is an independent software engineer, helping startups and established companies create teams and systems that are easy to change. When he's not doing that, he's the father of two boys, partner of Keren, and the keyboard player of progressive rock band Subterranean Masquerade.

name: Erez Posner
title: 3D Algorithms Team Lead
bio: Signa sealing systems co-founder and algorithms team leader at Intuitive Surgical, Erez Posner is a machine learning researcher with a track record of developing and deploying state-of-the-art techniques in the fields of Computer Graphics and Computer Vision. Erez's research is primarily focused on cutting-edge techniques for 3D reconstruction, SLAM, and AI-driven video synthesis. Erez holds a BSc and an MSc in Electrical Engineering from Afeka College and Ben Gurion University, respectively.

name: Dafna Mordechai
title: Deep Learning Compiler Engineer
bio: Dafna is a Deep Learning Compiler Engineer with extensive experience in designing, implementing, and testing software systems across various architectures, ranging from microcontrollers to high-performance computing systems. She is passionate about technology and enjoys sharing her knowledge with others through mentoring, giving talks and workshops, tech-blogging, and volunteering in tech communities and initiatives aimed at promoting diversity within the industry.

name: Victor Trakhtenberg
title: VP Engineering
bio:
I am a software engineering leader with extensive experience in guiding people, products, and processes. Passionate about technology, implementation, and deployment methodologies, I thrive on building products and teams that achieve business goals while fostering a strong organizational culture. Currently, I serve as VP Engineering at Guardz. Prior to this, I was a VP R&D at PayEm and VP Engineering at Next Insurance. Before that, I led the development of Personalization Products at Taboola, following its acquisition of Commerce Sciences, where I served as VP R&D.

I also co-founded the JavaIL community (www.meetup.com/JavaIL/) and have been actively involved in the Reversim Summit. As a co-organizer of Reversim Summit 2016, I was responsible for conference content and moderated sessions in 2014, 2015, 2017, 2019, and 2024.

name: Einat Mahat
title: R&D Group Leader
bio: Einat has been mastering the engineering field for two decades. She has vast experience in scale and architecture challenges. Over the years, she took leadership roles and became an engineering manager whose passion is to develop people, software, and products. She mentors managers and developers and helps them in their professional growth and volunteers as part of the core-team at "Baot", Israel's largest community for women in R&D.

name: Inbar Danieli
title: Software Developer
bio: Developer, CSS enthusiast, and cat lover.

name: Opher Vishnia
title: Principal Engineer
bio: Developer, designer, speaker and a spark for creative magic

name: Avraham Rosenzweig
title: R&D Manager
bio: Managing the Contacts group at Wix, leading a team of engineers responsible for building powerful solutions used by millions worldwide. Passionate about team growth and product impact, combining technical expertise with a love for leadershipâ€”always with a smile.

name: Benjamin Gruenbaum
title: Infrastructure Developer
bio: Developer @ Eon, Node.js core team member and maintainer, speaker and open source and human lover

name: Rachel Wities
title: NLP Researcher
bio:
Rachel Wities is a Senior Data Scientist at Microsoft Healthcare and Life Sciences group, and a Co-Founder of MeDS - Medical Data Science Israel community.

Rachel is a public speaker addressing Healthcare NLP challenges, and believes that understanding doctors and their needs is the key to successfully implementing AI Healthcare algorithms.

Loves her family, God and Oxford Comma jokes.

name: Adir Amsalem
title: Member of the Technical Staff
bio: Software developer with 15+ years' experience in web development - frontend, backend, infrastructure and developer tools

name: Ifat Koller
title: Leading POCs initiatives at Cloudinary Innovation Labs
bio: After the privilege of working on large-scale, complex systems and chasing engineering perfection, Iâ€™ve crossed over to the dark side: crafting creative POCs. Itâ€™s such an exciting world of 'quick and dirty' experiments, fueled by mumblings like 'only what moves the needle', 'done is better than perfect' and 'ship it already!' Off the clock, I mostly juggle (life). Yet, I always make time to blow off steam on the catchball court and bluff (badly) on poker nights.

name: Liad Yosef
title: Principal Engineer
bio: Frontend developer, software architect, tech speaker and an Analog Astronaut
